message: On our way back to Glitter, I make a point of taking it slow so I can give Clear another lecture.
Clear trails behind me. It's almost sad how deflated he is.
I'm trying to be as gentle as I can, but internally I'm getting pretty frustrated.
I don't have time to be fooling around like this! I need to get to Toue...
Clear replies meekly, then suddenly stops.
It takes me a moment to notice, so I'm a few steps ahead of him by the time I turn around.
Clear is silent and still, almost like he's listening for something.
Clear suddenly grabs me by the arm and starts running.
I look back, but no one else is in sight.

name: クリア
message: "They're still a little ways away, but I can hear their footsteps. It's not just one or two people either."
I pull my arm from Clear's grasp. I mean, he just led me on a wild goose chase. I'm not about to take anything he says at face value.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you really sure about that? You sure you're not just confused?"

name: クリア
message: "No, I'm not confused. I really did hear them. Please believe me."
Come to think of it, this sort of thing's happened before. His hearing's really keen, isn't it?
If he's wrong again, though... I am gonna be pissed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You better be right. I don't wanna waste any more energy."
Clear whips around, grabs my arm again, and takes off running.
